name: The world of rewind
description:
The world of rewind is a quest based game!

Complete all 5 quests to receive all 5 keys and save the world of rewind!

Only controls you need are: WASD & left mouse button.

Playtime: 15-20min, speedrun around 7.5min.

In order to make this game I went through the process of learning blender in 2 weeks and Unity 3D in 1. I really enjoy game development and want it to become my future! In order to do that I need to improve as much as possible and make a name for myself upfront because in my country game development isn't really a big thing.

If you want to check out my devlogs & content definitly check me out on youtube at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWnfpwx93mLw13ZxHYs_FHg.

I hope you have a great time playing my game!
